entities.description: An attempt to cut down or stop using marijuana within the past 12 months.
Inability to stop using marijuana despite multiple attempts within the past 12 months.
The respondent often wishes to cut down or stop using marijuana within the past 12 months.
Any long-lasting or repeated physical health problems caused or worsened by marijuana use within the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent attempted to cut down or stop using marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent was unable to stop using marijuana despite multiple attempts in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent often wished to cut down or stop using marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent experienced long-lasting physical health problems caused or worsened by marijuana use.
